data.title: Instal the new version for mac BleachBit 4.6.0
data.meta_description: added a script to create Porteus modules.right-click on a directory "Search" to launch catfish (shortcut: Ctrl+f).right-click on a directory "Disk Usage" to launch ncdu.(menu : Accessories/Change...
data.text:
added a script to create Porteus modules.right-click on a directory "Search" to launch catfish (shortcut: Ctrl+f).right-click on a directory "Disk Usage" to launch ncdu.(menu : Accessories/Change Windows password). add a script to automate chntpw launch.add a python script to recover the Windows key.Once Porteus has started, double-click on the module to activate it. You can download the Wine module from Sourceforge and paste it onto the key in the directory of your choice. You can download the Libre Office module from Sourceforge and paste it into the porteus/optional directory on the USB key to have the Libre Office application in Porteus. Using Rufus or the script New_Ikki_USB_Creator_en.sh you can modify Ikki Boot by adding additional software. If needed, Rufus is available at the root of ISO.Ä¯ew Porteus modules are no longer included by default, but are still available on Sourceforge in the extra directory. The documentation for creating the key from Windows has been updated. Ikki Boot is now fully compatible with Rufus. add a script to check a disk partition with the fsck command.add a script to make yt-dlp easier to use.(menu: Accessories/Change Linux password).

add a script to change a Linux account password.

dd file to mount the disk image (Mount IMG file)

antiX distribution ad blocker (menu : settings/Adblock).

pardus image writer 0.6.1 (replace mkusb).

If you like my project and would like to support me, a donation page is now available. switch from python to bash for the tldr client.add a menu and scripts to facilitate the use of Porteus in Text mode.

add "Backup" and "Console" in the xfce menu in order to group applications.add a script to compress (tar) and encrypt (gpg) files and folders.mate disk analyzer 1.26.0 replace baobab.
